DOC.brief_summary: In May 2010 first danish physician-staffed Helicopter Emergency Medical Service ( PS-HEMS ) implement Region Zealand Capital Region ( exclude Bornholm ) Denmark . In relation introduction PS-HEMS , team collaborator lead Rasmus Hesselfeldt , conduct observational study investigate possible effect time definitive care , secondary transfer 30-day mortality `` '' `` '' design . Results show reduced time first dispatch arrival trauma centre 218 min 90 min . Secondary transfer trauma centre drop 50 % 34 % 30-day mortality significantly reduce 29 % 14 % year implementation . The present study observational cohort study long-term follow-up trauma population mention . Patients follow may 1st , 2014 . Primary outcome early retirement secondary outcome quality life mortality . The investigator hypothesize great proportion trauma patient `` '' period remain occupation approx . 3 4.5 year compare trauma patient treat `` '' period .
